page.title: 06EVENTS.
page.content: The Ripley Guy Fawkes bonfire attracts thousands to its torch lit procession with floats, bonfire Queen, fireworks, fancy dress parade and funfair. Visitors contribute to the funds of the over-60's Club, which provides the refreshments. Here, as in Pyrford, there is a summer Flower Show with many attractions and both villages hold Harvest Suppers and Christmas Fairs, the Pyrford Fair being on a large scale benefitting Church charities. William of Ockham's 900th anniversary was the Ockham event of 1985. (see Special Feature on the Church). Church Flower Festivals are increasingly popular. In Ockham, the New Year is rung in by the Church bellringers and there is a house to house carol singing by Church members in aid of local charities.
